sql: select * from lte_order_track l where handle_state='未派单' and cluster_type='高速指标' and l.file_path IS NOT NULL and l.file_path <> ''
update lte_order_track set handle_state='初步方案制定', cluster_count= ? , question_count= ? where order_code=?
select COALESCE(count(1),0) cluster_count,COALESCE(sum(question_count),0) question_count from lte_cluster_question where order_code=?
select vcjlplbnum from ${tableName} e where vctype=? and not exists ( select vcClusterProblemNum from mt_gaosu_lte_city_month t where t.vcClusterProblemNum=e.vcjlplbnum )
select vcjlplbnum from ${tableName} e where vctype=? and not exists ( select vcClusterProblemNum from mt_gaosu_gsm_city_month t where t.vcClusterProblemNum=e.vcjlplbnum )

INSERT INTO lte_cluster_question ( cluster_code, question_count, city, cluster_longitude, cluster_latitude, int_month, data_source, question_type, question_date, question_section, first_analysis, order_code, handle_state, is_show, times, order_type, home_grid, problem_status ) select vcClusterProblemNum cluster_code, ProblemActiveNum question_count, c.intcityname city, flonb cluster_longitude, flat cluster_latitude, intdateid int_month, DataSources data_source, ProblemType question_type, FirstProblemTime question_date, ExpresswayName question_section, FirstAnalysis first_analysis, ? order_code, '初步方案制定' handle_state, 1 is_show, 0 times, '高速工单' order_type, expresswayname home_grid, '初步分析中' from mt_gaosu_lte_city_month m left join d_city_info c on m.intcityid=c.intcityid where EXISTS(select 1 from ${tableName} t where vctype=? and m.vcClusterProblemNum=t.vcjlplbnum) and filemaik =(select max(filemaik) from mt_gaosu_lte_city_month)

INSERT INTO lte_cluster_question ( cluster_code, question_count, city, cluster_longitude, cluster_latitude, int_month, data_source, question_type, question_date, question_section, first_analysis, order_code, handle_state, is_show, times, order_type, home_grid, problem_status ) select vcClusterProblemNum cluster_code, ProblemActiveNum question_count, c.intcityname city, flonb cluster_longitude, flat cluster_latitude, intdateid int_month, DataSources data_source, ProblemType question_type, FirstProblemTime question_date, ExpresswayName question_section, FirstAnalysis first_analysis, ? order_code, '初步方案制定' handle_state, 1 is_show, 0 times, '高速工单' order_type, expresswayname home_grid, '初步分析中' from mt_gaosu_gsm_city_month m left join d_city_info c on m.intcityid=c.intcityid where EXISTS(select 1 from ${tableName} t where vctype=? and m.vcClusterProblemNum=t.vcjlplbnum) and filemaik =(select max(filemaik) from mt_gaosu_gsm_city_month)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ${tableName} ( vcjlplbnum varchar(200), vctype varchar(200) ) location ('${externalPathStr}') format 'csv' (delimiter '|' null '') log errors into err_sales_ext_t segment reject limit 1000 rows

insert into lte_gaosu_cluster_count(vcclustercode,vcclusterstatus,intproblemcount,intactivitycount,intaddcount,vcordercode,dtcreatedate,vcproblemtype) select vcclusterproblemnum,clusterstate,totelproblemnum,problemactivenum, case when clusterstate='更新' then totelproblemnum-COALESCE(c.intproblemcount,0) when clusterstate='新增' then problemactivenum else 0 end intaddcount, ? vcordercode, now() dtcreatedate,g.problemtype from mt_gaosu_lte_city_month g left join (select intproblemcount,vcclustercode,rank() OVER (PARTITION BY vcclustercode ORDER BY dtcreatedate DESC)n from lte_gaosu_cluster_count t) c on g.vcclusterproblemnum =c.vcclustercode and c.n=1 where clusterstate in('新增','更新') and EXISTS(select 1 from ${tableName} t where vctype=? and g.vcclusterproblemnum=t.vcjlplbnum) and filemaik =(select max(filemaik) from mt_gaosu_lte_city_month)

insert into lte_gaosu_cluster_count(vcclustercode,vcclusterstatus,intproblemcount,intactivitycount,intaddcount,vcordercode,dtcreatedate,vcproblemtype) select vcclusterproblemnum,clusterstate,totelproblemnum,problemactivenum, case when clusterstate='更新' then totelproblemnum-COALESCE(c.intproblemcount,0) when clusterstate='新增' then problemactivenum else 0 end intaddcount, ? vcordercode, now() dtcreatedate,g.problemtype from mt_gaosu_gsm_city_month g left join (select intproblemcount,vcclustercode,rank() OVER (PARTITION BY vcclustercode ORDER BY dtcreatedate DESC)n from lte_gaosu_cluster_count t) c on g.vcclusterproblemnum =c.vcclustercode and c.n=1 where clusterstate in('新增','更新') and EXISTS(select 1 from ${tableName} t where vctype=? and g.vcclusterproblemnum=t.vcjlplbnum) and filemaik =(select max(filemaik) from mt_gaosu_gsm_city_month)
